page.title: 14GRANDWAY'S WAREHOUSE VISIT.
page.content: This warehouse on National Avenue has been used by{Grandways}for eleven years. It supplies 86 Grandways and Goodfellows shops in{Yorkshire, {Nottinghamshire, Lincolnshire, {Derbyshire and Humberside.}Two thousand tons of food is stored there, which is a ten day supply for all the shops. They also supply all their shops with hardware, wines, spirits, tobacco, clothing and packing materials such as bags, carriers and string. Fifty lorries, on average, arrive daily with goods and Grandway's fleet of of twenty two heavy goods vehicles leave each day to deliver to the shops. Much of the loading is done by fork lift trucks and a workforce of sixty people. The goods are stored in one vast warehouse with storage units many metres high.
